Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Formaecin 1 (natural AMPs; glycopeptide; XXGo, Pro-rich; PrAMPs; insects, ants, BBPP, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Crucial residues: A synthetic form without glycosylation is markedly less active.

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  The only Thr is O-glycosylated.Activity: Active against E. coli NCTC 8196 and E. coli BLR.MOA: This Proline-rich peptide acts on an intracellular target. APD update 8/2012; 5/2017 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Mackintosh JA, Veal DA, Beattie AJ, Gooley AA.1998
Literature Information.Title: Isolation from an ant Myrmecia gulosa of two inducible O-glycosylated proline-rich antibacterial peptides.
